jobDescription: Our Client, a well known global sales, research and advisory firm is looking to hire a Fundamental Analyst to join team.The ideal candidate is someone who has one to three years experience as an investment banking analyst.The analyst does not have to be a sector specialist. Looking for someone that can be a generalist, covering event driven/ special situation strategies. The Analyst will be responsible evaluating situations/events, valuing/modeling, comparison analysis and publishing notes/research. You will be working in a group environment and conducting research calls with the firms clients, primarily Hedge Funds.Compensation is a base salary and a bonus. Bonus can be multiplies of the base, depending on the individuals performance and firm's performance.All inquiries kept confidential
